attributes.action: Allow hearing impaired into the armed reserve forces under certain exceptions
attributes.background: People who are hearing Impaired or people who wear hearing aids have never been allowed to serve their country in the police or in the military, however, this can change with modernization in logistics and development of hearing aid technology as well as sign language etc

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand you're concerned about hearing impaired people joining the Armed Forces Reserves, but we're not sure exactly what you want the Government or Parliament to do. In particular, we 're not sure what you mean by "under certain exceptions". You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.
